page.title: 14Badlesmere : Education
page.content: There are no schools in the area. Children of primary school age travel to Selling or Faversham but mainly to Sheldwich County Primary School (with provision for l2O children). A nearby primary school (26 pupils) was closed in July l985 and closure threatens all rural schools with a roll of less than 6O. Selection tests at age ll are still carried out in the Kent Education area; the nearest secondary schools are at Ashford and Faversham. Free transport (taxi, mini-bus) is provided by the Education Authorities for children under age 8 living over 2 miles from school, and for those over 8 over 3 miles from school. There are sufficient private schools within a 3O mile radius to cope with the increasing demand.
